abstracts.value: • Here the spin period of sub-millisecond pulsar is calculated. • The possibility of observing such a sub-millisecond pulsar is given. • The magnetic field and the equation of state of new born sub-millisecond pulsar is presented.

titles.title: Gravitational wave GW170817: A new-born sub-millisecond pulsar and the properties of coalescing double neutron stars
